name: react-instantsearch
description: âš¡ Lightning-fast search for React and React Native apps, by Algolia

scripts.build: yarn build:cjs && yarn build:es && yarn build:umd
scripts.build:cjs: babel connectors.js dom.js index.js native.js server.js --root-mode upward --out-dir dist --quiet
scripts.build:es: BABEL_ENV=es babel connectors.js dom.js index.js native.js server.js --root-mode upward --out-dir dist/es --quiet
scripts.release: yarn clean && yarn preparePackageFolder && yarn build && cd dist && yarn publish --non-interactive
scripts.release:beta: yarn clean && yarn preparePackageFolder && yarn build && cd dist && yarn publish --tag beta --non-interactive
